review: Bit laggy on videos viewed from chrome browser. Everything else works great! Love it!
author: winnie kwan

review: We were using the X-box to watch Netflix, now with Chromecast we don't need to fight for the TV. Also the video quality is really good!
author: MelliOmaha

review: Easy to set up easier to use great product
author: karim heras

review: Still some minor kinks to work out. But overall, so far it's been fantastic, and exactly what I was looking for.
author: Gary Nilges

review: Works great for streaming Netflix from my phone. Very happy with this purchase!
author: Amri Covarrubias

review: This is great for streaming youtube or other videos to tv's without having to hookup cables to them.  So, I bought a second one for our second TV.
author: Inkspot "Sam"
